method.name: copy
method.description: Copy this email from the current folder to dst_folder. If folder dst_folder does not exist, our engine creates a new folder with the name dst_folder

method.name: delete
method.description: Delete this email from the currently selected folder.

method.name: forward
method.description: Delete this email from the currently selected folder.

method.name: reply
method.description: reply to the sender and additional recipients.

method.name: reply_all
method.description: reply all to the sender & recipients and additional recipients

getter_archieve.name: get_content
getter_archieve.description:
Return contents of this email / thread. 

 Developers can selectively retrieve some emails of the thread by using parameter cond. cond should be a callable that returns boolean. Default value of cond is True and it will retrieve from all emails in the thread.

getter_archieve.name: get_date
getter_archieve.description:
Return arrival date of this email / thread.
Developers can selectively retrieve some emails of the thread by using parameter cond. cond should be a callable that returns boolean. Default value of cond is True and it will retrieve from all emails in the thread.

getter_archieve.name: get_gmail_labels
getter_archieve.description:
Return a list of notes of this email / thread.
Developers can selectively retrieve some emails of the thread by using parameter cond. cond should be a callable that returns boolean. Default value of cond is True and it will retrieve from all emails in the thread.

getter_archieve.name: get_note
getter_archieve.description:
Return a list of notes of this email / thread.
Developers can selectively retrieve some emails of the thread by using parameter cond. cond should be a callable that returns boolean. Default value of cond is True and it will retrieve from all emails in the thread.

getter_archieve.name: get_sender
getter_archieve.description:
Return a sender of this email / thread.
Developers can selectively retrieve some emails of the thread by using parameter cond. cond should be a callable that returns boolean. Default value of cond is True and it will retrieve from all emails in the thread.

getter_archieve.name: get_subject
getter_archieve.description:
Return a subject of this email / thread.
Developers can selectively retrieve some emails of the thread by using parameter cond. cond should be a callable that returns boolean. Default value of cond is True and it will retrieve from all emails in the thread.

getter_archieve.name: get_recipient
getter_archieve.description:
Return a list of recipients of this email.
Developers can selectively retrieve some emails of the thread by using parameter cond. cond should be a callable that returns boolean. Default value of cond is True and it will retrieve from all emails in the thread.

getter.name: get_content
getter.description: Return a content of this email.

getter.name: get_date
getter.description: Return an arrival date of this email.

getter.name: get_gmail_labels
getter.description: Return a list of labels of this email.

getter.name: get_labels
getter.description: Return a list of notes of this email.

getter.name: get_sender
getter.description: Return a sender of this email.

getter.name: get_subject
getter.description: Return a subject of this email.

getter.name: get_recipients
getter.description: Return a list of recipients of this email.

mode.name: get_history
mode.description: Get an interaction history with this recipient. To specify the range of time, set parameter hours. Parameter cond should be a callable that returns boolean. Default value of cond is True and it will retrieve from all emails exchanged with a contact of the email.

mode.name: get_mode
mode.description: Get an index of a current email mode

methods.name: add_gmail_labels
methods.description: Add labels to email in the current folder.

methods.name: add_labels
methods.description: Add note to email in the currently folder.

methods.name: remove_gmail_labels
methods.description: Remove one or more labels from this email in the currently selected folder. labels should be a list of strings.

methods.name: remove_labels
methods.description: Remove one or more labels from this email in the currently selected folder. labels should be a list of strings.

folder.name: list_folders
example: >>>  [(('\HasNoChildren',), '/', u'Boomerang'), (('\HasChildren',), '/', u'Boomerang-Outbox'), (('\HasNoChildren',), '/', u'Boomerang-Outbox/Cancelled'), (('\HasNoChildren',), '/', u'Boomerang-Returned'), (('\HasNoChildren',), '/', u'INBOX'), (('\HasChildren', '\Noselect'), '/', u'[Gmail]'), (('\All', '\HasNoChildren'), '/', u'[Gmail]/All Mail'), (('\Drafts', '\HasNoChildren'), '/', u'[Gmail]/Drafts'), (('\HasNoChildren', '\Important'), '/', u'[Gmail]/Important'), (('\HasNoChildren', '\Sent'), '/', u'[Gmail]/Sent Mail'), (('\HasNoChildren', '\Junk'), '/', u'[Gmail]/Spam'), (('\Flagged', '\HasNoChildren'), '/', u'[Gmail]/Starred'), (('\HasNoChildren', '\Trash')]

folder.name: rename_folder
folder.description: Change the name of a folder
